website_summaries.verdict: A versatile liquid bronzer that looks and feels nice on the skin of those who can wear the universal shade.
pros: Has a light consistency that makes it perfect to wear over sunscreen or under foundation
Highlights facial contours to provide a healthy glow
Doesn't take much product to cover your entire face
cons: The dropper is a bit awkward to use
Color won't work for all tones, especially very light skin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this as a foundation because it fits my skin tone more than the no foundation foundation does. I don't use a lot but I apply it with a flat head brush and it gives a nice soft coverage. It's not as heavy as most liquid foundations. I like it for an everyday soft look!
customer_reviews.author: LadeeMitchell

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a soft, natural glow
customer_reviews.text: Have used for a couple of weeks and love it. It is saturated with color so when the directions say to use two drops, it means it. Frequently, it is the only thing (other than sun protection) that I apply to my face. If you are looking for a dramatic made-up look, this is not for you. If you are looking to brighten your complexion with a natural sun-kissed glow, this is for you. I also use the highlighter and the blush. Both are saturated with color, however I use a little more than the directions call for.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Belmore

customer_reviews.title: Not like product I purchased from Perricone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product from the perricone website last year, used it and loved it. I still had some of the previously purchased product left -- this product is not the same. The price is significantly lower so I thought I would give it a try -- but if this is truly from perricone md -- it must be product which did not meet their standards. The color is off, it does not blend easily. I am going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Just Thinking

customer_reviews.title: Best Liquid Bronzer
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It finishes matte, but at the same time has this hint of illuminating. It blends really well, makes your skin so so soft, and is a really natural looking color. I will add a few drops to my BB Cream to add some over all color and mix, or a few drops to my sunscreen/primer for a more natural look. Will also use it along for extra color or contouring. I have really sensitive skin and this product does not make me break out. Really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get this product to work, it may be all me, maybe I just don't know how to apply it. I wear a bronzer by cargo that was discontinued, so I'm looking for a new one... this will not be it. Once I put it in I can't disperse it, it accumulates on the spot. I have to shake every time before I use it otherwise it's separate liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Let's roll.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Lasts almost all day. Good as a bronzer or to add to foundation that is too light in color. Doesn’t break my sensitive acne prone skin out.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy ECW

customer_reviews.title: Great Liquid Bronzer
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It came highly recommended so I gave it a try . Easy to apply ( I use a brush) and very natural looking . It is a little pricey for a bronzer but it is liquid and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: PinkZebra

customer_reviews.title: I was really hoping to love this. Shade too dark for me and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to love this. Shade too dark for me and I broke out. Will keep trying to work with it
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: I like this product for the most part
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for the most part. The only thing I don't like about it is that it's kind of glittery... otherwise I like it. Gives me a nice natural bronzed look. I apply it to my cheek bones, nose, and forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Natural look
customer_reviews.text: My Favorite Bronzer of all time. Had to find at Sephora but buy multiple on amazon! Great product and so natural looking for a perfect glow.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Laporte

customer_reviews.title: Little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a few years. In the winter, I add to my moisturizer. In the summer, I apply direct with a makeup brush. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: eortlepp

customer_reviews.title: Nice texture but a little 'orangy' for me and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice texture but a little 'orangy' for me and it rubs off on my clothes, which I never experienced with powder bronzer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E

customer_reviews.title: blends so easily!! it will be too dark however to ...
customer_reviews.text: blends so easily!! it will be too dark however to wear when the tans fades.
customer_reviews.author: worstmomintheworld

customer_reviews.title: Feels silky
customer_reviews.text: I liked just about everything about it easy to apply feels silky. Very natural
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Use sparingly a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Product easy to apply no streaking looks natural. I can only find it on line. Stores that did carry it no longer do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the perricone makeup and the eye shadow but this ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the perricone makeup and the eye shadow but this —- not so much. It is on the orange side.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. First all the dropper never worked right. It was very hard to apply. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: barbara krasley

customer_reviews.title: Too sparkly
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this liquid bronzer. While it applies really easily, it's very sparkly which I wasn't anticipating.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Olson

customer_reviews.title: It's not a great bronzer. Not enough color and sticky.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care for it. It felt sticky on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Offen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product just wasn't for me. To dark and didn't blend well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives a nice touch of color
customer_reviews.text: It is very smooth and blends extremly well. Gives a nice touch of color. Overall very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: kirby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bronzer! looks very natural and last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Flugen4

customer_reviews.title: I love it (and the bronzer) - will order both again
customer_reviews.text: I love it (and the bronzer) - will order both again. It lasts quite a long time which I appreciate :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: This is awful. Not a serum, more like paste. Dark, not mixed, and yucky. I have had good success with this line of products, and I have spent quite a bit of money on them. However, this particular product is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Katz

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful product. I use this on the days I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product. I use this on the days I'm wearing be cream or cc and just want a simple application. Has a small of golden shimmer but in the end gives your skin a 'natural' look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefer Powder
customer_reviews.text: I don't really prefer liquid bronzer. I think I prefer the powder better that I can apply with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Diane P.

customer_reviews.title: Subtle
customer_reviews.text: I like the product very much. When I look a little pale or when I need some contouring the No Bronzer Bronzer comes in very handy. I took one star away because it could be a little easier to blend as in the No Foundation Foundation. I anticipate that as this product gets old it may get even harder to blend, but as of right now it works fine. It gives me just the added touch I need for a healthy glow.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tuminelli

customer_reviews.title: I love it! it looks very natural on me
customer_reviews.text: I love it! it looks very natural on me, I am medium olive complexion. It last for a good part of the day. However, I don't wear makeup everyday and when I do its very natural. Since I don't wear make up often I lend to touch my face alot which might contribute to it wearing off quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bronzer
customer_reviews.text: Add a few drops to Perricone MD serum foundation for a flawless look. No settling into fine lines and wrinkles, no heavy grease feel. This product allows your skin to breathe it doesn't smother it. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Shepherd Mom

customer_reviews.title: too dark
customer_reviews.text: received a small bottle however a tiny bit goes along way---it was not really a bronzer it was more a darker heavier color, did not work well for me and I am medium toned Caucasian and was looking for a light sun kissed glow with moisture--did not find it in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jere Bibb

customer_reviews.title: Great product awful dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I adore this product and color perfect mixed with my moisturizer but the bottle and dispenser is awful
customer_reviews.author: JRV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good specially to add to no make up make up ! Light and give a lovely glow
customer_reviews.author: gaye m combs

customer_reviews.title: Good - Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Good bronzer - not great. The product works well yet it thickens up in the eye dropper used to extract the product from the vial. You only need a little drop of the product to get “bronze”.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J. Drosin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but wish it was a tad darker. Natural look, but expensive.
customer_reviews.author: SharonC

customer_reviews.title: Too much shimmer / glitter
customer_reviews.text: Love the consistency but it is VERY sparkly - almost glitter-like.
customer_reviews.author: chc5003

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just started to using this product and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does not look like picture shown
customer_reviews.text: does not look like picture shown..It has no dropper top, just a screw top and the color is rather muddy. Very expensive for what it is... Have to blend this really really well with liquid make up so I don't look like I paInted my face dark brown. Not my favorite bronzer. Prefer Josie Maran's.
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: Love this bronzer
customer_reviews.text: Love this bronzer! It lasts all day & goes on wonderfully. It works well as an all over face & neck bronzer, as well as for contouring. It is very easy to apply (I just use my fingers). It is pretty sheer & not to very dark - which works great for me because, I am very fair.The only draw back is, it only lasts me about 3 months & then I have to buy more (good for the company though).
customer_reviews.author: Lalena

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea that it is skincare
customer_reviews.text: Of all the Perricone products I've tried, this one was the most satisfactory. The No Foundation Foundation does not offer enough coverage for me, and I was skeptical about this product. As it turns out, it provides a modest amount of bronzing that looks natural. I generally use it by adding to my lighter foundations, but have used under my makeups as well. I like the idea that it is skincare.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyBrookTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: No Bronzer Bronzer
customer_reviews.text: I love Perricone! This bronzer is very easy to use, and looks so natural. It also lasts a long time as you need so little.
customer_reviews.author: PaulDeb 7183

customer_reviews.title: I did not try the bronzer. The shipment box ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not try the bronzer. The shipment box was sealed but the product box arrived open and the bottle containing the bronzer was not sealed so I returned it for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Harvey

customer_reviews.title: This the worst make up
customer_reviews.text: This the worst make up. It is difficult to apply and does nothing to improve your complexion. Even worse, the makeup is thick and feels like you are wearing a mask.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good product but I know a better on
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is indeed a beautiful, subtle bronzer and I was very excited when it finally arrived in the mail, goes on smooth, looks like skin, warms up the face just right....you know, all that good stuff.....however I find that the results are very very similar to a foundation that is 2 or 3 shades darker than my complexion!!! Yup, and one foundation that's great and pretty much gives the same result is the Loreal Magic Nude Liquid Powder foundation and you get like 3 times the product for a 3rd of the price......so the 3 stars is cause it works but save your money and do makeup the smart way........
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Flawless and natural
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best bronzer I've ever used! It looks completely natural on my fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: LovesToCook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it with the no foundation foundation to add just a hint of color.
customer_reviews.author: Suznmarie

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok ! But I definatly wont buy again. It's too small for the big price.
customer_reviews.author: Maria F.

product_meta.title: Perricone MD No Makeup Bronzer, 0.3 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Perrine MD No Bronzer 0.3 oz.

BRAND STORY
With groundbreaking discoveries comes pioneering treatments. Our holistic approach combines an anti-imflammatory diet with nutritional supplements and advanced skincare.
